member.name: T:Infoware.Reportes.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.My.Resources.Resources.open
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.My.Resources.Resources.print
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.My.Resources.Resources.save
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: T:Infoware.Reportes.ReportColumn
member.summary: Defines a column into whch text can be rendered on a line of a table when the is bound to a datasource.

member.name: E:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.ReportBegin
member.summary: Raised once immediately before anything is printed to the report. The cursor is on the first line of the first page.

member.name: E:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.PrintPageBegin
member.summary: Raised for each page immediately before anything is printed to that page. The cursor is on the first line of the page.

member.name: E:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.PrintPageBodyStart
member.summary: Raised for each page immediately after the header for the page has been printed. The cursor is on the first line of the report body.

member.name: E:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.PrintPageBodyEnd
member.summary: Raised for each page immediately before the footer for the page is printed. The cursor is on the first line of the header.

member.name: E:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.PrintPageEnd
member.summary: Raised for each page after the footer has been printed. The cursor is past the end of the footer, typically into the bottom margin of the page.

member.name: E:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.ReportEnd
member.summary: Raised once at the very end of the report after all other printing is complete. The cursor is past the end of the footer on the last page, typically into the bottom margin of the page.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.DataSource
member.summary: By setting this property we provide the report with a data source. The data in the data source will be rendered into the report in tabular format based on the columns defined in the property.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportDocument.DataMember
member.summary: The DataMember property allows us to easily set a single column of data to be displayed when the report is bound to a data source. If we want to display multiple columns of data in the report we should use the property to define the columns.

member.name: T:Infoware.Reportes.ReportLineJustification
member.summary:
This is a list of the possible text justification values used by the
and
methods.

member.name: T:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs
member.summary: The ReportPageEventArgs the type of the parameter provided by the events raised from the object. This class includes methods to simplify the process of rendering text output into each page of the report.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes some text to the report starting at the current cursor location. The cursor is moved to the right, but not down to the next line.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.Write(System.String,Infoware.Reportes.ReportLineJustification)
member.summary: Writes text to the report on the current line, but justified based on the justification parameter value. The cursor is moved to the right, but not down to the next line.
member.param: Indicates the justification for the text.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.WriteColumn(System.Object,Infoware.Reportes.ReportColumn)
member.summary: This method writes text into a specific column within the report on the current line. It uses a object to define the X position and width of the column. The cursor is not moved by calling this method.
member.param: The text to render into the column.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.WriteLine
member.summary: Moves the cursor down one line and to the left side of the page.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes text to the report starting at the current cursor location and then moves the cursor down one line and to the left side of the page.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.WriteLine(System.String,Infoware.Reportes.ReportLineJustification)
member.summary: Writes text to the report on the current line, but justified based on the justification parameter value. The cursor is moved to the right, but not down to the next line.
member.param: Indicates the justification for the text.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.HorizontalRule
member.summary: Draws a horizontal line across the width of the page on the current line. After the line is drawn the cursor is moved down one line and to the left side of the page.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.CurrentX
member.summary: Sets or returns the current X position (left to right) of the cursor on the page.
member.value: The horizontal position of the cursor.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.CurrentY
member.summary: Sets or returns the current Y position (top to bottom) of the cursor on the page.
member.value: The vertical position of the cursor.

member.name: M:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.PositionToStart
member.summary: Moves the cursor to the top left corner of the page.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.PageBottom
member.summary: Returns the Y value correspondign to the bottom of the page body. This is the position immediately above the start of the page footer.
member.value: The Y value of the bottom of the page.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.EndOfPage
member.summary: Returns True if the cursor's current location is beyond the bottom of the page body. This doesn't mean we're into the bottom margin, but may indicate that the cursor in the page's footer region.
member.value: A Boolean indicating whether the cursor is past the end of the page.

member.name: P:Infoware.Reportes.ReportPageEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: Returns the page number of the current page. This value is automatically incremented as each new page is rendered.
